content: I'm facing an odd problem. Whenever I open a file with .lean extension anywhere in desktop, the intellisense works. But it doesn't work for any file in a project. Can anyone please help me regarding this? Thanks in advance.

Probably your project is misconfigured somehow. Are you sure you are opening the directory of the project (the directory containing lakefile.lean) in vscode as the root directory? What happens if you navigate to that file on the command line and run lake build. or lake env lean path/tot/my_lean_file.lean  from that same root directory?

Alex J. Best said:

Probably your project is misconfigured somehow. Are you sure you are opening the directory of the project (the directory containing lakefile.lean) in vscode as the root directory? What happens if you navigate to that file on the command line and run lake build. or lake env lean path/tot/my_lean_file.lean  from that same root directory?

I forced the intellisense many times by Ctrl+Space and it started working. I configured the project by following the instructions in the documentation. That is why I got confused when the intellisense didn't work. Now it's ok. Thank you for your help.
Subhajit Bandyopadhyay has marked this topic as resolved.
